con:part.con:content: <application xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <grammars> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified"> <xs:element name="Item" type="commentVO"/> <xs:complexType name="commentVO"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="author" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="content" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="modifiedOn" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="title" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </grammars> <resources base="http://localhost:8094/logicaldoc/services/mobile/comments"> <resource path="/"> <resource path="addcomment/{sid}/{docid}"> <param name="sid" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <param name="docid" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <method name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="addcommentform/{sid}/{docid}"> <param name="sid" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <param name="docid" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <method name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/x-www-form-urlencoded"> <param name="content" style="query" type="xs:string"/> </representation> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="getcomments/{sid}/{docid}"> <param name="sid" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <param name="docid" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <method name="GET"> <request/> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resource> </resources> </application>
